mapper.insert: insert into operate_log(operate_emp_id, operate_time, class_name, method_name, method_params, return_value, cost_time) VALUES (#{operateEmpId}, #{operateTime}, #{className}, #{methodName}, #{methodParams}, #{returnValue}, #{costTime})
mapper.select: select operate_log.*, emp.name operateEmpName from operate_log left join emp on operate_emp_id = emp.id
